summary: A complete retexture of Skyrim roads now with parallax, for ENB or no ENB users. Many roads to chose: dark, normal, white, with green moss, with orange moss, with dust and snow variants.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/40245-1-1376433578.jpg[/img]

This is my first attempt to make a texture mod for Skyrim (already did for other games) so forgive me if something is wrong. Why i made it?. Because i was bored at work.

[center][youtube]Ae5lFfmypUs[/youtube][youtube]bgx3PzTJJ6E[/youtube][/center]

[size=4][b][color=orange]Update 3:[/color][/b][/size]
- Added FOMOD installer for both versions, credits to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/7831761/?]Krysalynne[/url].

[size=4][b][color=orange]Update 2:[/color][/b][/size]
- Added Eastmarch, mountains and whiterun roads.

[size=4][b][color=orange]Update 1:[/color][/b][/size]
- Added parallax to The Reach, snow roads and The Rift.
- Better parallax file for all roads.
- Added 2 different files, for ENB and non ENB users. Easy installation with NMM now.
- Added 4 region zones with many roads to choose.

[size=6][b][color=orange]Note:[/color][/b][/size]
[size=4][b][color=red]The pics are taken with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37978/?]Performance and Realistic ENB[/url] high settings + realistic upgrade.[/color][/b][/size]

[size=6][b][color=orange]INSTALLATION[/color][/b][/size]

[size=4][b]With ENB:[/b][/size]
[size=4][b][color=red]1[/color][/b][/size]- Download the Immersive Roads for ENB and install via NMM or copying content into Skyrim/data folder and click "yes" when prompted.
[size=4][b][color=red]2[/color][/b][/size]- Activate the immersive roads.esp in NMM.
[size=4][b][color=red]3[/color][/b][/size]- If you want to change any roads download the region file you want, chose the road and copy TEXTURES folder to Skyrim/data folder and click "yes" when prompted.
[size=4][b][color=red]4[/color][/b][/size]- Edit enbseries.ini or enblocal.ini and set FixParallaxBugs=true

[size=4][b]Without ENB:[/b][/size]
[size=4][b][color=red]1[/color][/b][/size]- Download the Immersive Roads without ENB and install via NMM or copying content into Skyrim/data folder and click "yes" when prompted.
[size=4][b][color=red]2[/color][/b][/size]- Activate the immersive roads.esp in NMM.
[size=4][b][color=red]3[/color][/b][/size]- If you want to change any roads download the region file you want, chose the road and copy TEXTURES folder to Skyrim/data folder and click "yes" when prompted.

[size=6][b][color=orange]COMPATIBILITY[/color][/b][/size]
I tested and work good with vanilla game, Skyrim HD textures and aMidianBorn Landscape 1. You have to install those first, then this mod overwriting all

[size=6][b][color=orange]Road Options[/color][/b][/size]
